description:
Popular for beautiful melodies and lyrics that tell a story, we've collected Diao ye zong's songs into the "Diao ye zong Song Pack"!
In addition to the old favorite, "Lies and Lamentations" and
the highly-requested, "NeGa/PoSi*Love Call," it includes an original song sung by Alice's VA, Asami Seto: "Player's Score"!
Indulge your Spell Bubbler soul with these sublime songs!

This pack contains the following:

■6 Songs
　・Lies and Lamentations
　・NeGa/PoSi*Love/Call
　・Kids' Play
　・Untitled “The Usual Everyday Lives of the Flying Shrine Maiden and the Ordinary Magician”
　・Tsukumo Melody Tale
　・Player's Score
/ Diao ye zong feat. Alice Margatroid (VA: Asami Seto)

■6 Challenge Stages
　・Lv5 Cirno Pro's Lessons (Tsukumo Melody Tale)
　・Lv6 Lies and Agitations (Lies and Lamentations)
　・Lv7 She Never Changes (NeGa/PoSi*Love/Call)
　・Lv8 Play, Fair Maiden! (Untitled “The Usual Everyday Lives of the Flying Shrine Maiden and the Ordinary Magician”)
　・Lv9 This Ain't Child's Play (Kids' Play)
　・Lv10 Thanks For Playing With Me (Players Score)

*Internet connection required for purchase.
* Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.
name: Diao ye zong Song Pack
